PASSWORD.description: The password of lighthat, you can use uuid as the password (http://www.uuid.online/ online generation)

V2_Path.description: V2 handler path. Auto-generated with some secret value.

AppName.description: App Name filled in at the top (or even full domain if there is a custom one) to generate the configuration and QR code. If you donâ€™t want to generate it, enter no

QR_Path.description: QR code and configuration link path, the default qr_img, you can also use uuid for confidentiality, but it cannot be the same as V2_Path. If the AppName variable is no, this variable has no effect
